alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:04AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 445 AM MDT... At 403 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Juniper to 20 miles northeast of Montello. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Snowville, Park Valley, Curlew Junction, Lucin and Locomotive Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 20. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 9 and 38, and between mile markers 53 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
